education: Digital Games, Instituto de Educação Superior de Brasília - IESB

projects.title: Reddit Clone
projects.description: Project made with the intention to clone a Reddit subreddit page, contains responsive design and dynamic functionalities by consuming data from an API REST.

projects.title: Prime Visuals
projects.description: Simulation of prime numbers visual patterns, contains the Ulam Spiral and the Parallax Compression forms of visualization.

projects.title: Dog & Quote
projects.description: Web Application that shows a random quote and picture of a dog dinamically, through the data consumption from Type.Fit Quotes API & Dog API.
